column5: and made further oration. "By George! that clock's half an hour fast! First time in ten years I've known it to be off. This watch of mine never varies a--" But the citizen was talking to vacancy. He turned and saw his hearer
column7: flying in the direction of a house with three lighted upper windows.

column1: 2029|8.29|At 8.29 I punched the front doorbell in Elgin Crescent. It was opened by a small oriental woman in a white apron. She showed me into a large
column2: empty sitting room with an open fire and a couple of huge oil paintings.
